text: Ralph Milne (13 May 1961 â€“ 6 September 2015) was a Scottish footballer. He played for Dundee United, Charlton Athletic, Bristol City and Manchester United. He played as both an attacking midfielder or a winger. Milne died in Dundee, Scotland from liver disease, aged 54. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Charlton Athletic F.C. players Category:Deaths from liver disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Scotland Category:Footballers from Dundee
title: Ralph Milne
